text_block_list.name: Hoshina Kiyoko
text_block_list.text:
Welcome to the Yukoma hot spring village. 
We have been awaiting you.

text_block_list.name: Yunohana Bloom
text_block_list.text:
Please leave your luggage with me. 
No matter its size, I will take care of it. 
I am a horsegirl, after all♪

text_block_list.name: Yunohana Bloom
text_block_list.text:
Your rooms are straight through here… 
Ah, and the baths are this way.

text_block_list.name: Yunohana Bloom
text_block_list.text:
Its location between the rocks and view 
over the beautiful neighboring mountains 
are our pride and joy.

text_block_list.name: Yunohana Bloom
text_block_list.text:
Lastly, you can find yukatas over here… 
My, I see you're itching to get in already.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
It smells great here♪ 
And look at how big it is!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
This is awesome! 
Ehehe, I'm gonna be first in♪

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Activation of parasympathetic nerve detected. 
Status: In Paradise…

text_block_list.name: Transcend
text_block_list.text:
—— Oh, there you are. You certainly 
were enjoying your time in the baths. 
Tired, perhaps?

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: Why don't we take a walk? Nice and slow… hm?

text_block_list.name: Hoshina Kiyoko
text_block_list.text:
Heh… Take all the time you need to relax. 
Humans and horsegirls, we both value 
our well-being.
